ImageWidth.text: The number of columns of image data. This is equal to the number of pixels per row.

ImageLength.text: The number of rows of image data.

BitsPerSample.text: The number of bits per image component.

Compression.text: This represents how the image data was encoded.

ResolutionUnit.text: The unit used for measuring XResolution and YResolution.

ExifOffset.text: The offset to EXIF subsection IFD.

Make.text: The manufacturer of the imaging equipment.

Model.text: The model name or number of the equipment.

Software.text: The name and version of the software or firmware of the imaging equipment.

Orientation.text: The image orientation viewed in terms of rows and columns

YCbCrSubSampling.text: The sampling ratio of chrominance components in relation to the luminance component.

YCbCrPositioning.text: The position of chrominance components in relation to the luminance component.

DateTime.text: The date and time of image creation.

XResolution.text: The number of pixels per ResolutionUnit in the ImageWidth direction

YResolution.text: The number of pixels per ResolutionUnit in the ImageLength direction

ComponentsConfiguration.text: The information specific to the compressed data.

ShutterSpeedValue.text: The length of time the imagining equipments sensor was exposed to light.

DateTimeOriginal.text: The date and time when the original image data was generated.

DateTimeDigitized.text: The date and time when the image was stored as digital data.

MeteringMode.text: The setting used to determine how the imaging equipment measures the light.

ColorSpace.text: The colour space specifier, typically sRGB is used to define the colour space.

FocalLength.text: The actual focal length of the lens, in mm.

ExifImageWidth.text: The valid image width, specific to compressed data.

ExifImageHeight.text: The valid image height, specific to compressed data.

FocalLengthIn35mmFilm.text: The equivalent focal length assuming a 35mm film camera, in mm.

SceneCaptureType.text: The indication of the type of scene.

Sharpness.text: The direction of sharpness processing applied.

SubjectLocation.text: The location and area of the main subject in the scene.

FNumber.text: The ratio of the focal length to the aperture diameter of a lens.

ExposureProgram.text: The program used to set exposure.

ISOSpeedRatings.text: The ISO speed and ISO latitutde of the imaging equipment

GPSLatitudeRef.text: The indication to whether the latitude is north or south.

GPSLatitude.text: The latitude, presented as degrees, minutes, and seconds.

GPSLongitudeRef.text: The indication to whether the longitude is east or west.

GPSLongitude.text: The longitude, presnted as degrees, miniutes, and seconds.

GPSAltitudeRef.text: The altitude used as the reference altitude. If the reference is sea level, and the altitude is above sea level, 0 is given. If the altitude is below sea level,1 is given, with the altitude being an absolute value.

GPSAltitude.text: The altitude based on the AltitudeRef, in meters.

GPSTimeStamp.text: The time, indicated as UTC, presented as hour, minute, and second.

GPSDateStamp.text: The date information relative to UTC, presented as year, month, day.

GPSImgDirectionRef.text: The reference for giving the ImgDirection, 'T' indicates true direction, 'M' indicates magnetic direction.

ImageDescription.text: The character string giving the title of the image.

Artist.text: The name of the image creator.

LensModel.text: The lens's model name an model number.

LensSpecification.text: The infomation of the lens of the imaging equipment, noting the minimum and maximum focal length, minimum f-number in the minimum focal length, an the minimum f-number in the maximum focal length.

SubSecTimeOriginal.text: The record of fractions of seconds for DateTimeOriginal.

SubsSecTimeDigitized.text: The record of fractions of seconds for DateTimeDigitized.
